data.title: All About Al Ittihad Square Park in Sharjah: Location, Timings & More
data.meta_description: Explore the tranquil Al Ittihad Square Park in Sharjah, located in the heart of the emirate in the Al Nud area. Our guide has all the essential information.
data.meta_site_name: A blog about homes, trends, tips & life in the UAE | MyBayut
data.text:
Things to do

Location and Tickets

Timings

FAQs

If you’re on the lookout for a lush-green oasis in Sharjah, visit the beautiful Al Ittihad Square Park. In an otherwise busy area of the emirate, this park is a welcome respite. The place offers tranquil picnic spots, a lush green landscape and countless outdoor activities to enjoy. Read on to find out more about Al Ittihad Square Park and what makes it worth a visit.

THINGS TO DO AT AL ITTIHAD PARK SHARJAH

Al Ittihad Square Park is one of the top parks in Sharjah where you can stretch your legs and get some fresh air. The park is located in the Al Nud neighbourhood. The lush-green well-landscaped grass is perfect for a stroll in the evening or early morning and a much-needed retreat for locals and visitors.

Al Ittihad Park is also home to the iconic Pearl Monument – a homage to the pearl diving industry that was once a significant part of commerce and trade in the UAE.

Nestled amidst two iconic locations – The Blue Souk and The King Faisal Mosque, Al Ittihad Square Park in Sharjah is a peaceful retreat for people of all ages.

After exploring the verdant landscapes and taking beautiful pictures for the gram, you can even go shopping at the Gold Souk and Sharjah Central Souk nearby.

AL ITTIHAD PARK LOCATION, TICKETS

The complete Al Ittihad Park address in Sharjah is: Zahra Road, King Abdul Aziz Street. Junction, Al Soor.

The park is in proximity to Al Mahata and Al Jubail. As for the Al Ittihad Park Sharjah tickets, entry to the park is free for everyone.

AL ITTIHAD SQUARE PARK OPENING HOURS

The park is open 24 hours for the general public.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

WHAT ARE SOME OF THE MOST POPULAR PARKS IN SHARJAH?

Sharjah has several stunning parks located in various districts in the emirates. Al Safya Park, Al Majaz Park, Al Fayha Park, Sharjah National Park and Rolla Square Park are some of the best parks in Sharjah.

HOW TO GET TO AL ITTIHAD SQUARE PARK IN SHARJAH?

The park is accessible through public transport in Sharjah via bus routes E303, E306, E307, E307A and E400. The closest station to Al Ittihad Square Park, King Faisal Road, Gold Souq (Old) located over 623 meters away.

If you’re driving, use the Al Ittihad Park location plus code: 89XP+3J Sharjah for directions.

That’s a wrap of our review of Al Ittihad Square Park Sharjah. Residents living near Al Nahda might also want to visit Al Nahda Park in Sharjah. Due to its wide and spacious walkways, it is the favourite place of the nearby residents for their morning jog.
